description: PM Modi chairs high level meeting with Madhya Pradesh CM Shivraj Singh Chouhan on drought & water scarcity in the state The Prime Minister Shri Narendra Modi, today chaired a high level meeting o
caption: nm-4.com
message:
My meeting with Shivraj Singh Chouhan & his team of officials was a comprehensive one, in which we discussed ways to mitigate the drought. 

Shivraj ji briefed me on the several steps MP Govt. has taken for drought management not only now but for the last decade. Happy to learn about priority MP Govt. is attaching to key schemes like Fasal Bima Yojana & Krishi Sinchai Yojana. This will help farmers.

Urged MP Govt to continue the focus on micro-irrigation, liquid fertilisers & building farm ponds. http://nm-4.com/pxqo
